Set up and customize your AI settings ea: Set up and customize your AI settings easily.
Set up and customize your AI settings easily
Specify the maximum number of credits pe: Specify the maximum number of credits permitted for this package. To allow unlimited credits, enter -1
Customize the conversion rate from token: Customize the conversion rate from token to credit for each AI model to control AI usage costs in your system.
For each model, enter the number of cred: For each model, enter the number of credits that will be deducted for each token used.
means 20 token = 1 credits (using this m: means 20 token = 1 credits (using this model will cost double).
If you leave a field blank, the system w: If you leave a field blank, the system will use the default value of 1 credit/token.
You can adjust this rate at any time to: You can adjust this rate at any time to suit your pricing strategy or cost control needs.
means 20 tokens = 1 credit (using this m: means 20 tokens = 1 credit (using this model will cost 20x).
You can update your AI models in two way: You can update your AI models in two ways.
Update directly from built-in providers: Update directly from built-in providers (no files are uploaded or sent outside).
Upload a JSON file manually (downloaded: Upload a JSON file manually (downloaded from our official website).
Any models not listed in the new data wi: Any models not listed in the new data will be removed from your database.
This will automatically fetch and update: This will automatically fetch and update models from OpenAI, Gemini, Deepseek, Claude...
Safe: only updates database, no files ar: Safe: only updates database, no files are transferred.
Are you sure you want to update and impo: Are you sure you want to update and import AI models automatically? This will replace existing ones.
Download the latest AI models JSON file: Download the latest AI models JSON file from our website, then upload it here to update your system.
Are you sure you want to upload and impo: Are you sure you want to upload and import models from JSON file? This will replace existing ones.
AI models updated and imported successfu: AI models updated and imported successfully!
AI models imported successfully from JSO: AI models imported successfully from JSON file!
